review: This is by far the best purchase ever! The interface if much better than what my samsung tv came with. It is much faster and easier to find what you want to watch. It is very easy to use, and even my 5 year old grandson can work it. It works with all services with the exception of HBOGO and xfinity. Hopefully this will be worked out in the near future.

review: I am shocked at the poor support from Amazon.  I had three seperate online chats with support about the fact that this device does NOT support 1080i TVs.  EACH one of the three support people disconnected from the chat when I asked directly if the device supports 1080i displays. I will see what this post brings in terms of better support or an answer and will update accordingly. Is this how Amazon treats PRIME customers?
